Changelog
=========

0.2 (2011-12-27)
-------------------

- Assigned quickuploadportlet to galleries

- Added previewimages in galleryview using contentleadimages.

- Added dependencies to be pulled automatically
    collective.contentleadimage 
    collective.fancybox
    collective.quickupload


0.1 (2011-05-11)
-------------------

- Initial release
